scripts.lint: npm --prefix server run lint:fix && npm --prefix client run lint:fix
scripts.format: npm --prefix server run format && npm --prefix client run format
scripts.lint:check: npm --prefix server run lint && npm --prefix client run lint
scripts.format:check: npm --prefix server run format:check && npm --prefix client run format:check
scripts.types:check: npm --prefix server run types:check && npm --prefix client run types:check
